i love cold weather.
i favorite brand of clothing is donna karen.

participant_2.background:
I'm not a fan of my singing voice, but I love to dye my hair different colors.
i have a timeshare in mexico.
I do not have any children, but I love my family and Netflix.
I love using my creative talents to make a difference in the world.
i play music in my spare time.

content.text: Hi, how are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing alright. I just bought my first house with my husband and we're really excited about it.
That's great! Congratulations! I'm sure you'll both love it.
Thanks! We're planning on spending a lot of time there, especially in the winter. I love the cold weather.
Me too! I'm not a fan of the heat. I have a timeshare in Mexico that I love to go to in the summer.
That sounds amazing! I've never been to Mexico. I'd love to go someday.
You should! It's a beautiful country. And the food is amazing!
I've heard that. I'm a big fan of Mexican food.
Me too! I love all the different flavors and spices.
Me too. It's so flavorful.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a drummer in an indie band.
That's awesome! I love music. What kind of music do you play?
We play a mix of rock and pop.
That sounds cool. I'm a big fan of rock music.
Me too! We're actually playing a show in Mexico next month.
That's so cool! I'll have to come see you.
You should! It would be great to meet you.
Sounds good! I'll let you know when I'm going.
Cool. I'm looking forward to it.
Me too.
